column1: Here we show that in vitro, ATM phosphorylates the Ser - Gln / Thr - Gln ( SQ / TQ) cluster domain ( SCD) on Chk2, which contains seven SQ / TQ motifs, and Thr68 is the major in vitro phosphorylation site by ATM.

The inability of the competitive inhibitor of nitric oxide synthase N ( G) - monometyl - L - arginine ( 20 and 200 microM) to revert Tat action on forskolin - induced cAMP accumulation, and of two potent nitric oxide donors, PAPA and DETA ( 0. 1 - 2 m M), to alter forskolin - induced cAMP accumulation, excluded an involvement of nitric oxide in Tat - induced adenylyl cyclase inhibition.

Unlike E2F - 1, - 2, and - 3, E2F - 4 did not accumulate in the nucleus unless it was coexpressed with DP - 2, p107 and p130, but not pRb, stimulated nuclear localization of E2F - 4, either alone or in combination with DP - 2.
